question: 諮問
userExplanation: a more formal word used to refer to consultation or seeking advice, often in legal or official contexts.
partsOfSpeech: noun, する verb, の adjective
sourceMnemonic: I need to <kanji>consult</kanji> you on this <kanji>problem</kanji>, if I could. I have a <vocabulary>question</vocabulary> / <vocabulary>enquiry</vocabulary> I'd like to ask you.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
